018package com.github.tommyettinger.kryo.gdcrux;
019
020import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo;
021import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Serializer;
022import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Input;
023import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Output;
024import com.github.tommyettinger.gdcrux.PointF2;
025
026/**
027 * Kryo {@link Serializer} for gdcrux {@link PointF2}s.
028 */
029public class PointF2Serializer extends Serializer<PointF2> {
030
031    public PointF2Serializer() {
032        setAcceptsNull(false);
033        setImmutable(false);
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public void write(final Kryo kryo, final Output output, final PointF2 data) {
038        output.writeFloat(data.x);
039        output.writeFloat(data.y);
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public PointF2 read(final Kryo kryo, final Input input, final Class<? extends PointF2> dataClass) {
044        return new PointF2(input.readFloat(), input.readFloat());
045    }
046
047    @Override
048    public PointF2 copy(Kryo kryo, PointF2 original) {
049        return new PointF2(original);
050    }
051}
